remarks: Define "all some" applied to a top-level implication, which means ` ps ` is true whenever ` ph ` is true and there is at least one ` x ` where ` ph ` is true.  (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 20-Oct-2018.)
statement: df-alsi $p |- ( A! x ( ph -> ps ) <-> ( A. x ( ph -> ps ) /\ E. x ph ) ) $.
